sentences.en: a penetrating analysis of the issue
sentences.cn: 对那个问题精辟的分析

sentences.en: As their roots are strong and penetrating, they prevent erosion.
sentences.cn: 它们的根十分粗壮而且扎得很深，从而避免了受侵蚀。

sentences.en: He examined the man with a penetrating gaze.
sentences.cn: 他以锐利的目光仔细观察了那个人.

sentences.en: He gazed at me with a sharp, penetrating look that made my heart pound.
sentences.cn: 他的目光敏锐而犀利，看得我心里怦怦直跳。

sentences.en: He had an extraordinarily penetrating gaze.
sentences.cn: 他的目光有股异乎寻常的洞察力.

sentences.en: He never stopped asking penetrating questions.
sentences.cn: 他一直在问一些尖锐的问题。

sentences.en: Her voice was nasal and penetrating.
sentences.cn: 她说话带有鼻音，很刺耳。
他的分析真是入木三分.

sentences.en: His head cocked to one side, studying me with his penetrating eyes.
sentences.cn: 他歪着头, 用他那锋利的目光仔细端详我.

sentences.en: I recognized him by his raucous, penetrating laugh.
sentences.cn: 我听到他那沙哑而又刺耳的笑声就能认出是他.

sentences.en: Mary heard the penetrating bell of an ambulance.
sentences.cn: 玛丽听到了刺耳的救护车警铃声。

sentences.en: Penetrating injury may be due to any of a variety of weapons.
sentences.cn: 任何一种武器均能造成穿透伤.

sentences.en: questions that are intelligent and penetrating
The concepts of penetrating and non - penetrating orbits must be modified.
sentences.cn: 必须修改贯穿式轨道和 非 贯穿式轨道的概念.

sentences.en: The essay is most penetrating and powerful.
sentences.cn: 这篇杂文极为深刻有力.

sentences.en: The man in the black overcoat shot a penetrating look at the other man.
sentences.cn: 身穿黑大衣的男子目光犀利地扫了另外一名男子一眼。

sentences.en: Under Yale's penetrating gaze, he wished he hadn't mentioned it.
sentences.cn: 在耶尔敏锐的目光注视之下, 他真后悔不该提起这件事.

words.tran_cn: 渗透的；尖锐的；有洞察力的

trans.tran_cn: 敏锐的，有洞察力的，聪明的，响亮的
trans.tran_en: showing an ability to understand things quickly and completely

trans.tran_cn: 贯穿，穿过( penetrate的现在分词)，刺入，了解，渗透
